pages.text: 86|1|Yi cangqiong he qi mingxing mengshi,
86|2|ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenmo?
86|3|Shi na canlan de mingxing.
86|4|Mei geren, dou youyige baohu zhe.
86|5|Ren yingdang xiang yi xiang, ta ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de?
86|6|Ta shi bei shechu de jingye zaocheng de.
86|7|Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de.
86|8|An la que shi neng shi ta fuyuan de,
86|9|na shi yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri.
86|10|Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
86|11|Yi han yu de yun,
86|12|he you feng di di fashi,
86|13|zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci,
86|14|zhe bushi xiaohua.
86|15|Tamen biding yao yong jimou,
86|16|wo ye yao yong jimou.
86|17|Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia.
87|1|Ni dang zansong ni zhigao zhu de daming chaojue wanwu,
87|2|ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi ge wu yunchen.
87|3|Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao.
87|4|Ta shengchu mucao,
87|5|ranhou shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao.
87|6|Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji,
87|7|chufei an la suo yu wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing.
87|8|Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu,
87|9|gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua.
87|10|Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu;
87|11|boming de ren, jiang tuibi,
87|12|ta jiang ru yu dahuo,
87|13|ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo.
87|14|Chunjie zhe biding chenggong,
87|15|ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong.
